channel.title: Posts on m4xshen
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on m4xshen

item.title: Vim Command Workflow
item.description: Max Shen shares his Vim motion workflow and provide some guidelines about how to edit text in Vim efficiently. You can learn when to use which Vim command in this tutorial.

item.title: Vim Basic Commands
item.description: Learn about the basics and practical comands in Vim. This tutorial covers normal mode, command-line mode and insert mode in Vim.
